content:
Hi All,
In the current fhir there are v2 mappings for fhir resources. When i observe all the resources some of the mappings are not included. These mappings are optional or any other?
Thank You,

@Grahame Grieve Hi,Where can i find the complete mappings for the FHIR resources.
Thank You,

There is a project in progress to map V2 to FHIR (project statement can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/2-To-FHIR). This is intended to yield a "definitive" mapping from an HL7 perspective on what V2 elements should be mapped to what FHIR elements, and as appropriate, create FHIR extensions to accommodate elements in V2 that are not in FHIR Core, but are known to be used in V2 messages. Anybody interested to join that effort, for notifications on meetings/etc., you can sign up to v2-to-fhir@lists.hl7.org. Additional discussions can happen on this zulip stream as well.
@Hans Buitendijk - this is great news for the V2 community! It will be very useful to have some "initial guidance" from HL7(.org) as to how to do the V2 to FHIR mappings!

About FHIR extensions:

create FHIR extensions to accommodate elements in V2 that are not in FHIR Core, but are known to be used in V2 messages.

Do you have any further information on how that is being done?
